content.rendered: We will send follow-ups, getting people who have never responded to your messages to reply and encouraging those who haven’t completed your call to action (signing up for your product/service) to follow through. All of this will be done at the most economical rate, offering the same number of DMs at 40-70% off our normal outreach rate. If you want to maximize the number of leads you generate and convert each month, this is a must!
